parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (11240027) at the end. This strongly suggests it is electoral propaganda material, as CMF numbers are used for tracking and reporting campaign spending.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions and promotes George Grasu, a candidate for the Chamber of Deputies in Dambovita County, for the SOS Romania party.  It clearly states his position on the ballot (position 8) and encourages voters to choose him. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, this message is designed to reach a wide audience, not just a select few. The use of hashtags further amplifies its reach and public nature. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to influence voters in Dambovita County to vote for George Grasu and the SOS Romania party. The call to action ("Vote for George Grasu") and the highlighting of his position on the ballot leave no doubt about its electoral intent. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic. It lacks objective reporting, analysis, or diverse perspectives. Instead, it directly advocates for a specific candidate and party.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a clearly partisan advertisement promoting a specific candidate and party within the context of an election.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1114646240320099</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers directly to a specific candidate (George Grasu), is used during the electoral campaign period (although the end date is given as 1732867200, which needs to be checked against the actual legal end date for the campaign), has a clear electoral objective (to increase votes for Grasu), and is disseminated to a wide audience via a paid Facebook advertisement. The presence of a CMF number further reinforces this conclusion.  The post's content is not journalistic in nature; it is explicitly promotional.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>George Grasu</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>SOS</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
SC Columna Film Studio SRL, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 1114646240320099) cu caracter de propagandă electorală, care promovează explicit candidatul George Grasu pentru Camera Deputaților din partea Partidului SOS România, Filiala Dâmbovița, indicându-i poziția pe buletinul de vot (poziția 8).  Postarea, plătită cu o sumă sub 100 RON, a generat între 6.000 și 7.000 de impresii și a vizat o audiență estimată între 100.000 și 500.000 de persoane, în principal în județul Dâmbovița.  Prezența numărului CMF 11240027 confirmă natura sa de material electoral. Obiectivul electoral este evident, prin îndemnul direct la vot pentru candidatul menționat.  Această acțiune constituie o încălcare clară a legii, deoarece postarea îndeplinește toate criteriile propagandei electorale după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie, conform articolului 98 t).  Datele de contact ale advertiserului sunt dambovita@sosro.ro și +40723957245.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
